text: Vasile Nicolae Constantin (born 18 January 1998) is a Romanian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for CS Universitatea Craiova. ==References== ==External links== * * Vasile Constantin at lpf.ro Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Craiova Category:Romanian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Liga I players Category:CS Universitatea Craiova players
title: Vasile Constantin
